Hello my name is Devansh and 
I am learning Android Development. 
 I started Learning Android Development during my freshmen year 
 and since then I am constantly learning and making basic apps I made a Login and Registration System as a part of my Freshmen Year End Project 
 The app uses Firebase to save registered users name , email and password 
 If the user is registered it moves to the welcome screen 
 Otherwise a Toast pops up with a message that the user is not registered 
 Besides that I made a simple Dice app which on clicking the button gives a us value on the dice and also as a toast
